meanings.sent1: The nondisableds in the class helped carry the heavy books.
meanings.sent2: The teacher made sure to include activities that all the nondisableds could participate in.
meanings.sent3: The party was so fun, even the nondisableds were dancing all night long!
meanings.sent4: In the land of the nondisableds, everyone could run as fast as the wind.
meanings.sent5: The nondisableds were like superheroes, always ready to lend a helping hand.

meanings.definition: People who do not have disabilities.
meanings.sent1: The nondisableds at the event enjoyed the accessible facilities.
meanings.sent2: It is important to create a welcoming environment for all the nondisableds.
meanings.sent3: The nondisableds were the first to reach the finish line in the race!
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room, making her stand out among the nondisableds.
meanings.sent5: The nondisableds moved gracefully, like swans gliding on a serene lake.
